name: Wheely 4
description: Who played in the game Cars, he knows hero Lightning McQueen. But that's not the only superhero among the machines. You definitely need to get acquainted with the car Willie. In the third part of the game Willie will save his beloved girl blue car of your dreams. In this game you will be able to help Willie, when will solve interesting quests and logic puzzles, in which fell on our beloved hero. touch the screen on the car Willie, and he will be either to go or to stay. touch the screen grab objects and levers!
